mapper.select: select * from ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(order by id) as rownumber , id, guquanid, zhuagntai, inputuser, lurushijian from Tb_guquan_zhuangtai )t where rownumber > = #{offset} and rownumber < = #{pageSize}+#{offset}
select count(*) from ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(order by id) as rownumber , id, guquanid, zhuagntai, inputuser, lurushijian from Tb_guquan_zhuangtai )t

SELECT id, guquanid, zhuagntai, inputuser, lurushijian from Tb_guquan_zhuangtai t where 1=1
and t.id=#{id}

SELECT id, guquanid, zhuagntai, inputuser, lurushijian from Tb_guquan_zhuangtai t where 1=1
and t.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into Tb_guquan_zhuangtai ( guquanid, zhuagntai, inputuser, lurushijian ) values ( #{guquanid}, #{zhuagntai}, #{inputuser}, getdate() )
